game.title: Chains of Fate
game.synopsis: A narrative-driven fantasy game that intertwines fate and freedom within the grandeur of a mythical kingdom.
game.beginning: A humble peasant, the protagonist, gets entangled in a royal conflict due to a mysterious birthmark that links them to an ancient prophecy.
game.ending: After facing trials and tribulations, the protagonist fends off the evil forces, achieves peace in the kingdom and unlocks the true meaning of their destiny.
